Standard VM Templates.name: Add your template IDs here
Standard VM Templates.description: Replace with actual IDs from your Qualys instance

Common VM Report Types.name: Use Manual Entry
Common VM Report Types.description: Find your template IDs in VM > Templates

how_to_find_ids: 2. Go to Vulnerability Management (VM) -> Reports -> Templates
3. Note the Template IDs from the list
4. Add them to this file or use Manual ID entry in Launch Report
instructions.api_endpoint: Use Custom Request to query: GET /msp/report_template_list.php or POST /api/2.0/fo/report/ with action=list

note: These are VM scan report templates. Your Qualys instance will have specific template IDs based on your subscription and configuration. Use 'List Report Templates' button with Custom Request to find them.
